divs: Sighting DetailsME AND MY WIFE WERE GETTING READY TO GO SWIMMING IN OUR POOL WHEN I LOOKED TOTHE SOUTH AND SAW TWO AMBER ORBS, THEY FADED OUT VERY FAST BUT I DID SEE THEM WEUSUALLY GO SWIMMING AT NIGHT AND ALWAYS SEE SOMETHING WHEN I SEEN THEM I KNEWTHEY WERE ORBS I KNOW THE REGULAR PLANES AND SATELLITES THESE WERE NOT THEM.JUST THE OTHER NIGHT WHILE IN OUR POOL WE OBSERVED AN ORB TRAVELING NORTH TOSOUTH RIGHT OVER US IT WAS ABOUT THE ELEVATION OF A PLANE AND ALWAYS AFTER ATIME IT60S LIGHT WILL FADE OUT WHILE IT60S TRAVLING THEN JUST BARELY YOU CAN MAKE IT OUT, IT60S VERY FAINT LIKE A LIGHT LIGHT BLUE, WE LIVE IN A RUAL AREA JUST OUTSIDE OFKINGMAN ARIZONA.
